caption:
The Daily Snitch: Thursday, May 24, 2018

Follow the Daily Snitch on LJ, DW, IJ, and on tumblr.

Harry Potter – Actors and Movies:
• Rupert Grint starring in Agatha Christie TV drama; Daniel Radcliffe in ‘Guns Akimbo’
• Ian McKellen Speaks Out on Dumbledore’s Sexuality
• Daniel Radcliffe’s “Beast of Burden” Now Available to Stream!

HP & The Cursed Child – Actors and Stage:
• “Cursed Child” Choreographer Recognized at Chita Rivera Awards
• Family Portraits Starring New “Cursed Child” London Cast Revealed

summary:
me with highest point on the leaderboard: *walks*
house prefect: oMG STOP MAKING MORE TROUBLES YOU'RE MAKING RAVENCLAW LOSING...
body:
HOGWARTS MYSTERY

me with highest point on the leaderboard: *walks*

house prefect: oMG STOP MAKING MORE TROUBLES YOU’RE MAKING RAVENCLAW LOSING THE HOUSE CUP! GO ATTEND MORE CLASSES AND EARN POINTS FOR RAVENCLAW!

me:

honestly what are my others House mates doing???

summary: Hogwarts houses as phrases I overhear
title: Hogwarts houses as phrases I overhear
body:
Gryffindor: "I know it's one week before exams but I need to marathon the Lord of the Rings!"
Ravenclaw: "There's so many natural occurrences in this world that we can't integrate so why-" "You still need to learn calculus" "fuck"
Hufflepuff: "I don't know what I'm doing, I just know how to make cookies"
Slytherin: "Why are all my most successful lies always unplanned? I don't understand"

dialogue.name: Gryffindor
dialogue.label: Gryffindor:
dialogue.phrase: "I know it's one week before exams but I need to marathon the Lord of the Rings!"

summary: Men of War - LadyBraken - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: Men of War - LadyBraken - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 10/?
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
Relationships: Albus Dumbledore/Gellert Grindelwald, Credence Barebone/Gellert Grindelwald, Albus Dumbledore/Harry Potter, Harry Potter & Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Credence Barebone & Harry Potter
Characters: Gellert Grindelwald, Albus Dumbledore, Harry Potter, Credence Barebone, Modesty Barebone, Aberforth Dumbledore, Original Percival Graves, Armando Dippet, Morfin Gaunt
Additional Tags: Time Travel, 1920s, to 1930s, to 1940s, Hurt/Comfort, Angst, Fluff, Eventual Smut, If yes Shamless Smut, Gellert Grindelwald Being an Asshole, a lot of fluff, But also, War, Torture, Violence, Possessive Behavior, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Depression, WW2, Credence Barebone Needs a Hug, Credence Barebone Gets a Hug, Riddle being an asshole, As canonicaly appropriate, Period-Typical Homophobia, Internalized Homophobia, I’ll protect Credence with my life, Complex Magic, Master of Death Harry Potter, No overpowerful, The Deathly Hallows, Wizarding Politics, Prohibition, MACUSA | Magical Congress of the United States of America, Government doing bullshit, Cinnamon Roll Newt Scamander, Safe Sane and Consensual, sometimes, Newt is the safest cutie on the planet, Harry is trying, Albus too, Other Additional Tags to Be Added
Summary:

Grindelwald is rising. Europe is preparing to war. The prohibition is creating new underground’s powers. The Great Depression will soon strike in the entire world. The ISS in threatened every day. The MACUSA is panicking. Albus Dumbledore is facing his old demons. Somewhere, the young Mr Riddle is testing his new powers at the orphanage, unknown to the wizarding world. A certain Obscurus is running around to seek safety. His Magicozoologist friend is running around for reasons.
And Harry… Harry is trying to avoid the worst.

A New chapter is up!!

summary:
Draco: you know, Potter? Maybe if you hadn't been such an oblivious git, we would have been dating since fourth year 
Harry: you...
body:
Draco: you know, Potter? Maybe if you hadn’t been such an oblivious git, we would have been dating since fourth year

Harry: you know, Malfoy? Maybe if you hadn’t been such a dick, I wouldn’t have deemed you my arch nemesis since the age of 11

summary:
Seriously. None. Either that or Harry is way more unobservant than I thought.
Like I'm currently scouring through all the books...
body:
Hogwarts Timetables Make No Sense

Seriously. None. Either that or Harry is way more unobservant than I thought.

Like I’m currently scouring through all the books trying to figure this out.

I’ll update y'all if I ever come to a conclusion with this, but yo. This ish is like a complex logic puzzle with no confirmed solution.

blog.name: imagine-whore
blog.title: imagines found!!
blog.description: i actually think i can write. i write for umbrella academy, marvel, and harry potter uwu requests r open

body:
Surprise

Plot: Draco Malfoy got into a fight and came home with bruises, so reader gave the ones who beat up her man what they deserve.

Warnings: Fights, Bullying

Pairings: Draco x Reader

Author’s Note: Hey guys!! I’m back after a long, long, hiatus! Here’s a Draco imagine to make up my absence. Much love ❤️

________________________________________

“Hey baby, how was de— who gave you that eye?” You were cut off as you saw Draco’s black eye and a purplish bruise on his cheekbone. “God, you really fight like a chicken, don’t you?”

Draco just smirks as you fetched some ice and wrapped it around a piece of cloth. You gently ice his eye, his bleeding lip and the bruise. He gave you a smile, a real toothy smile. You just rolled your eyes on him.

“Your punches must’ve sucked.” You said as you sat back again and continued your homework.

“Now’s not really the time to make a joke, I barely even hit their face.” Draco said. “Y/n, I think my nose is broken.”

You turn back and raised your wand at him, mumbled a healing spell as he yelped in pain while his nose is back in shape. “You are such a damsel in distress.”

“Hell yeah, but you still love me.” You felt his arms wrap around your shoulders and his lips on your cheek. You tried to shrug him off so you can concentrate on your stupid assignment, but he won’t let go of you. “Please, for the love of Merlin, Y/n, don’t go after them tomorrow morning.”

“Great, tomorrow afternoon’s a good time.” You laugh as Draco shook you and crossed his arms against his chest. You finally dropped your pen and stood up, facing him. He was pouting and brows was furrowed. “Maybe tomorrow evening?”

“That’s not what I meant!” Draco said, pouting again. “Don’t go after them. I’m fine! Plus, I won’t give you a name.”

“That’s okay, I already know them. Stated on your diary this morning ‘Arthur White and Justin Wallows tried to initiate a fight this Potions.’ So I think I know just fine, baby.” I smiled at him. “Come on! I won’t knock them out.”

“I think I should have a surveillance camera taped on your back.” Draco rolled his eyes. “Come here.”

You walked towards him and hugged him tight. You loved the feeling of being squeezed on his chest and him kissing your forehead so much. You smile at him as you kissed his lips.

“The ice has melted. I’m going to get more.” Draco said, walking away.

________________________________________

“Oh look, it’s the Draco’s little bitch.” Arthur White laughs at you, alongside with his friend Justin Wallows. A small crows circled you three. For Merlin’s sake, it’s just 8 and I’m dealing with idiots already. You thought. Instead of saying something back, you just rolled your eyes.

“What are you going to do, y/n? Hex us? You can’t even say something properly in Latin!” Justin Wallows said. You smirk at them, knowing damn well your fist has a special place on their face.

“Is that so, Wallows? Cause my Charms grade says otherwise. Oh, and is it me, or it’s your third time repeating that subject? I think it’s probably you being such a dumbass.” You said. You pulled their last straw, cause Arthur tried to punch you but caught it mid-air and twisted his arm.

He screams in agony as Justin tries to attack you but you kick him in the balls and hit his face with your knee, knocking him out immediately. As Arthur tries to punch you again, you deflect it and elbowed his face.

The crowd got bigger. You dusted off your shoulder, and you saw Draco’s smirk on the front line of the circle. McGonagall rushed to the crowd and scolded you immediately.

“Miss Y/L/N! Do you know how irresponsible you are for initiating muggle fighting inside the castle? 25 points from Gryffindor. And three weeks of detention!” McGonagall said as she dragged you away. You look back at Draco and winked at him, mouthing:

“It’s worth it.”

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
